name: Whataburger
description: Whataburger is an American regional fast food restaurant chain, headquartered and based in San Antonio, Texas, that specializes in hamburgers.

name: McDonalds
description: McDonald's Corporation is an American multinational fast food chain, founded in 1940 as a restaurant operated by Richard and Maurice McDonald, in San Bernardino, California, United States.

name: Chipotle
description: Chipotle, is an American chain of fast casual restaurants specializing in bowls, tacos and Mission burritos made to order in front of the customer.

name: Taco Bell
description: Taco Bell IP Holder, LLC, d/b/a Taco Bell, is an American multinational chain of fast food restaurants founded in 1962 by Glen Bell in Downey, California.

name: Jack in the Box
description: Jack in the Box is an American fast-food restaurant chain founded February 21, 1951, by Robert O.

name: Saltgrass Steak House
description: Informal Texas-themed chain offers a meaty menu & full bar amid cattle kitsch decor.

name: Grins Restaurant
description: Laid-back venue with a tree-shaded deck serving drinks & American eats to a mostly college crowd.

name: Chuy's
description: Chain serving "big as yo' face" burritos & other Tex-Mex dishes in kitschy, Elvis-heavy settings.
